input.command:
cd /home/user/project && npm run dev &
NEXT_PID=$!
sleep 5
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/translate" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "operation": "improve",
    "text": "This is a test sentence that need fixing.",
    "correctionsOnly": false,
    "writingStyle": "simple",
    "tone": "friendly"
  }'
sleep 2
kill $NEXT_PID 2>/dev/null || true
input.description: Test local API endpoint for writing improvement
